Class QuicServerCodecBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.netty.handler.codec.quic.QuicCodecBuilder<QuicServerCodecBuilder>
io.netty.handler.codec.quic.QuicServerCodecBuilder
public final class QuicServerCodecBuilder extends QuicCodecBuilder<QuicServerCodecBuilder>
QuicCodecBuilder that configures and builds a ChannelHandler that should be added to the ChannelPipeline of a QUIC server.

    • option

      public <T> QuicServerCodecBuilder option(ChannelOption<T> option, @Nullable T value)
      Allow to specify a ChannelOption which is used for the QuicChannel instances once they got created. Use a value of null to remove a previous set ChannelOption.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the value.
      Parameters:
      option - the ChannelOption to apply to the QuicChannel.
      value - the value of the option.
      Returns:
      this instance.
